summary: This is an email from a US Attorney's Office contractor forwarding civil lawsuits filed by the law firm Boies Schiller against Jeffrey Epstein's estate on November 12, 2019. The email indicates internal coordination within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding these new civil actions.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Person who requested that civil suits filed against Epstein's estate be passed along to recipients of the email.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the civil suits filed against his estate by the law firm Boies Schiller.

events.title: Boies Schiller files civil suits against Epstein estate
events.description: The law firm Boies Schiller files civil lawsuits against the estate of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Internal USANYS email forwarding civil suits
events.description: A contractor at the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York forwards the newly filed civil suits internally via email.

keyFacts: Civil lawsuits were filed against Jeffrey Epstein's estate by the law firm Boies Schiller on November 12, 2019.
The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) was internally coordinating and sharing these legal filings on November 13, 2019.
The document is an internal email forwarding attachments of the civil suits, indicating ongoing legal proceedings against Epstein's estate after his death.
